column1: Table 5.11: Cost estimate of minor irrigation related proposals with locations

column3: Conveyance efficiency is low. (16-acre vegetable) Recommend to construct100mm(thick) x 300mmx300mmx200m(long)concrete canal lining for the initial stretch.

Leaks from the concrete lined canal of 1.5km long and irrigating 95 acres. Recommend 75 mm thick curtainwall using grade 25 concrete with grooved cut and fill anchoring at 2m intervals. 2. Earth filling to narrow tracks and depressions to form channel bund of 1.5m wide and length about 300 m. 2. Protection by cover crops by cultivating edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface and vetiver grass edges.
Leaks from the concrete lined canal of 150km long and irrigating 10 acres. Recommend 75 mm thick curtainwall using grade 25 concrete with grooved cut and fill anchoring at 2m intervals.

Leaks from the concrete lined canal of 400m long and irrigating 10 acres. Recommend 75 mm thick curtainwall x 300m long using grade 25 concrete with grooved cut and fill anchoring at 2m intervals. 2. Earth filling to narrow tracks and depressions to form channel bund of 1.5m wide and length about 100 m. 2. Protection by cover crops by cultivating edible varieties such as Mukunuwenna, Gotukola, and Thampala along the incline surface and vetiver grass edges.
